trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Edmonton
There were no other sightings in Edmonton on or around December 31st 2003
divs: sighting detailsi was celebrating new years in a park waiting for the fireworks, when i got the urge to look through the trees directly above me and there i spotted what looked like a glowing squiggly line. it was like an s with an extra curve and stretched out. nobody but me seemed to notice it and then i showed my friend to make sure i wasn't crazy (for lack of a better term) and surely he saw it too. immediately it came into my mind that it was a ufo, even though back then i was still fairly young and i was never really interested in ufos or knew anything about them until the past few years. we watched it very slowly crawl across the sky rather mesmerized until it drifted out of view behind the trees. the object had very little movement but seemed to be shining brightly. the sight of it kindled some interest in me and really excited me as i believed i was witnessing something that many people don't see all their lives. it made me wonder if i was supposed to see it for it was rather unusual how i just knew it was directly above me, the sighting did not seem to me to be by chance. even though it was such a short vague encounter, i still believe it was something extraterrestrial\intraterrestrial\ultraterrestrial. i am rather positive this wasn't a satellite, concerning the very odd shape, and it did not seem military to me. however who knows considering the things our governments are hiding from us.
Summary: celebrating new years and roughly an hour before new years came i spotted a ufo very high up in a very unusual shape.
